price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí wọ́n bá darí rẹ̀ kúrò níbi (ìyà) ní Ọjọ́ yẹn, (Allāhu) ti ṣàánú rẹ̀. Ìyẹn sì ni èrèǹjẹ pọ́nńbélé.
arabic: مَّن يُصۡرَفۡ عَنۡهُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: man yuṣ'raf ʿanhu yawma-idhin faqad raḥimahu wadhālika al-fawzu al-mubīnu
